event.title: Nritya Bharatanjali 2015
event.desc: Dance Festival â€“ On Occasion of M.S. Natyalya's 3rd Annual Day. Our students present various performances and a wonderful Bharatanatyam dance ballet with the theme 'Bharat Satvan' - dance portraying life of Indian soldiers. M.S.Natyalaya dedicates it to this year's Republic day.

chiefguests.guest: Wg. Cdr. (Retd.) M.P. Benjamin - General Manager, HAL
Dr.Shalini Rao, MS DORL DNB FCPS, ENT Surgeon and Otologist, Rashmi Hospital

event.where: HAL Dr V.M Ghatge Convention Center, Old Airport road, Next to Aerospace Museum, Bangalore
